page.title: 17Dr.PAUL,ANNAN
page.content: I get up at 7.30am.Ihave a shower,get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast. I have a meeting at the surgery at 8.30am to discuss patients. I start seeing patients from 9am to 11.00am, then I open all the mail and read it,before going out for calls till lunchtime.If I'm on call I carry my bleeper so that if there is an urgent call the receptionist can contact me. After lunch I have a surgery from 2.00pm till 3.30pm,perhaps some more calls then a surgery from 4.00pm till 6.00pm.At about 7.00pmIcome home and have my tea.I'm on call every three or four days.If anybody needs me before 9.00am I have to go and see them at their house. If I'm not on call I often go out to play golf or work in the garden.
